```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
opts_knit$set(root.dir = "~/Desktop/Columbia MS Biostatistics/Research/Valeri lab/Practicum/Model results/Linear/")

library(tidyverse)
require("knitr")
```

```{r}
linear_df_results <-
  list.files(path = "~/Desktop/Columbia MS Biostatistics/Research/Valeri lab/Practicum/Model results/Linear/", pattern = "*.csv") %>% 
  map_df(~read_csv(.)) %>% 
  mutate(
    scenario = as.factor(scenario),
    metal = as.factor(metal)
  )
```

```{r}
linear_df_summary = linear_df_results %>% 
  group_by(scenario, metal) %>% 
  summarize_all(
    mean
  )

linear_df_summary %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = metal, y = RMSE, color = scenario)) + 
  geom_point()
```
